name: cs546-ratemycourses
description: Want to stack your schedule with great classes in Stevens? The RateMyCourses app is here to help. Plenty of resources like syllabuses, course reviews, professorsâ€™ teaching style and a robust set of search features will lead you directly to the perfect courses in the semester.
author: Sihong Lin, Jiayi Guo, Ziheng Zhu, Yinuo Lu, Bofei Wang
